ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Ken, I know the Wizard s Canon (I guess some are calling this the first book...) is Old Erudian.  Is the Doctrine of Wizardry written in Elder Elvish or
ygData.messageBody:
Ken,

I know the Wizard's Canon (I guess some are calling this the first book...)
is Old Erudian. Is the Doctrine of Wizardry written in Elder Elvish or
Tier'Dal? I've heard there are four books yet you list 5 languages that
you know or are working on. Are there more than four books? I really wish
you were on my server. I'd happily pay 5 plat to learn those languages.
Also, do wizards need ONLY runes?

Can anyone on the Karana server teach me other languages? I'll pay/trade
for them... (I already know Old Erudian to excellent. I also have several
non-rune reseach components I would gladly trade providing I dont need them
myself.)
-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Morris [mailto:kmorris2@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 12:31 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Languages


I am excellent in Dragon, Combine, Old Eurdian, Elder Elvish, and am
working on Elder Tier'Dal today. I will be happy to teach Dragon and
Combine for 6 runes each. The rest, I will teach for 3 runes or 5 plat
each. I am located on the Tarew Marr server. I am firm on the Dragon and
Combine btw. I won't accept money but only runes for those languages.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard
